title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Enhancements for eDiscovery support of Loop content
description:
,Now eDiscovery admins can review Loop components
created in Outlook or Teams within eDiscovery (Premium) as rendered HTML files
to help understand the content that has been created within the Loop component.
Once the component has been reviewed, it can then be exported as an HTML file
to meet the requirements of the case.
